question.title: How to create a JAR file for a JavaFX Application which opens on double clicking the JAR file
question.body:
I am currently working on a game in JavaFX.

I have to submit the game as a JAR file.

I have made sure I have a main class that does not extend Application

I tried to create the JAR file using the IntelliJ artifact method and the shade plugin method. Both of the method created a JAR file, but none of them were starting the JavaFX application when I double clicked the JAR file. The JAR file would only run from the terminal with the command java -jar filepath.jar.

The application runs from the terminal, but gives the following warning

com.sun.javafx.application.PlatformImpl startup WARNING: Unsupported JavaFX configuration: classes were loaded from 'unnamed module @66ec91e5'

How do I fix this. I want to be able to start the JavaFX application when I double click the jar file.

I am using OpenJDK 22 and OpenJFX 22.
